original_text: They took their daughters in marriage and gave their own daughters to their sons, and served their gods.
korean_text: 그들의 딸들을 맞아 아내로 삼으며 자기 딸들을 그들의 아들들에게 주고 또 그들의 신들을 섬겼더라

sentences.original_text: They took their daughters in marriage
and gave their own daughters to their sons
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자신들의 딸들을 자신들의 아들들에게 주었다
